name: term_query_with_matches
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH(message, "server query failed") | keep message

name: term_query_with_matches_argument
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH(message, "1d61a999d2a74ca66308cffdcb4a23c5fa1b77f1") | keep message

name: term_query_empty_template_term
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH(message, "gorgonzola") | keep message

name: term_query_empty_argument_term
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH(message, "123456787654321") | keep message

name: phrase_query_with_matches_only_template
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH_PHRASE(message, "failed to query the DNS server") | keep message

name: phrase_query_with_matches_argument_and_template
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH_PHRASE(message, "job 1d61a999d2a74ca66308cffdcb4a23c5fa1b77f1") | keep message

name: phrase_query_empty_many_term_matches
query: FROM logs-* | WHERE MATCH_PHRASE(message, "server query failed") | keep message
